languages.text: Впечатленные процветанием планеты, техножрецы решили укрепить связи с Вольным Торговцем и сократили длительность цикла общего обслуживания. В честь нового договора они поднесли в дар династии оборудование для малого мануфакторума.

Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.
languages.original_text: Впечатленные процветанием планеты, техножрецы решили укрепить связи с Вольным Торговцем и сократили длительность цикла общего обслуживания. В честь нового договора они поднесли в дар династии оборудование для малого мануфакторума.

traits.locale_text: Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.

Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.

languages.text: Impresionados por la prosperidad del planeta, los tecnosacerdotes deciden reforzar sus lazos con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente acortando el ciclo general de mantenimiento. En honor del nuevo acuerdo, ofrecen a la dinastía un regalo: equipamiento para un manufactorum menor.
languages.original_text: Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Impresionados por la prosperidad del planeta, los tecnosacerdotes deciden reforzar sus lazos con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente acortando el ciclo general de mantenimiento. En honor del nuevo acuerdo, ofrecen a la dinastía un regalo: equipamiento para un manufactorum menor.

languages.text: Impressionnés par la prospérité de la planète, les technoprêtres ont décidé de renforcer leurs liens avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en diminuant la durée du cycle de maintenance générale. En l'honneur du nouvel accord fraîchement conclu, ils ont offert un présent à la dynastie, sous la forme d'équipement pour un manufactorum mineur.
languages.original_text: Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Impressionnés par la prospérité de la planète, les technoprêtres ont décidé de renforcer leurs liens avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en diminuant la durée du cycle de maintenance générale. En l'honneur du nouvel accord fraîchement conclu, ils ont offert un présent à la dynastie, sous la forme d'équipement pour un manufactorum mineur.

languages.text: 繁荣的行星给那些技术神甫留下了深刻的印象。他们决定更加频繁地对这颗行星进行维护，加强与行商浪人之间的联系。为了庆祝双方达成的新协议，技术神甫向王朝赠送了一份礼物：小型制造工厂的全套设备。
languages.original_text: Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 繁荣的行星给那些技术祭司留下了深刻的印象。他们决定更加频繁地对这颗行星进行维护，加强与行商浪人之间的联系。为了庆祝双方达成的新协议，技术祭司向王朝赠送了一份礼物：小型制造工厂的全套设备。

languages.text: 繁栄する惑星に感銘を受けた技術司祭たちは、一般的なメンテナンスサイクルを短縮することで、ローグトレーダーとの関係を強化することを決定した。新たに締結された協定に敬意を表し、彼らは王朝に贈り物を申し出た…それは、下位の聖工場用の設備だった。
languages.original_text: Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 繁栄する惑星に感銘を受けた技術司祭たちは、一般的なメンテナンスサイクルを短縮することで、ローグトレーダーとの関係を強化することを決定した。新たに締結された協定に敬意を表し、彼らは王朝に贈り物を申し出た…それは、下位の聖工場用の設備だった。

languages.text: Beeindruckt von dem florierenden Planeten haben die Techpriester entschieden, ihre Verbindungen {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin} zu stärken, indem sie den Wartungszyklus verkürzen. Zu Ehren der neu unterzeichneten Vereinbarung haben sie der Dynastie ein Geschenk angeboten — Ausrüstung für ein kleines Manufactorum.
languages.original_text: Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Beeindruckt von dem florierenden Planeten haben die Techpriester entschieden, ihre Verbindungen {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin} zu stärken, indem sie den Wartungszyklus verkürzen. Zu Ehren der neu unterzeichneten Vereinbarung haben sie der Dynastie ein Geschenk angeboten — Ausrüstung für ein kleines Manufactorum.

languages.text: Refah içindeki gezegenin hâlinden etkilenen Tekno Rahipler, genel bakım aralıklarını kısaltarak Hür Tacir'le olan bağlarını sıkılaştırmaya karar verdi. Ayrıca yeni antlaşmanın şerefine hanedanlığa küçük bir manufaktorumda kullanılabilecek ekipmanlar hediye ettiler.
languages.original_text: Impressed by the prospering planet, the Tech-Priests have decided to strengthen their ties with the Rogue Trader by shortening the general maintenance cycle. In honour of the newly signed agreement, they offered the dynasty a gift — equipment for a lesser manufactorum.
